name: thisMachine
description:
thisMachine - development release (playable-alpha)

Gameplay - control a flap-flight creature that can cling to the ceilings and mine through the level. Collect GREEN Gems to increase power. Use power to mine or attack,. defend from wildlife. Find and destroy NEST, source of the mech-creatures. Obtain the KEY to travel through the energy portal. Continue deeper and deeper into the mine..,

note; lost stuff can be re-aquired, new player will form at base.

While fully playable, thisMachine is not "done",. more may be added, given the time and resources. Much could be done to optimize the code/rendering, but it runs fine on a middle of the road desktop PC. The simulation, collisions, etc. may breakdown if the program is given too little processing power. Try again on a more modern system.

This video is of an earlier prototype. (new video to come, in time)

Check the iteration numbers of the current download for updates.

[ May be released for Android w/ gamepad support at a later time? ]

$upport Appreciated (speeds UP development)
